name: Average Time Duration
query:
SELECT
    ROUND(
        AVG(
            TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(end_time, start_time))
        ) / 60,
        2
    ) AS average_minutes_last_7_days
FROM `tabAgent Run`
WHERE start_time IS NOT NULL
  AND end_time IS NOT NULL
  AND start_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
